Text: Thanks for this one!will you upload the x64 version with crack?

From the README file, this works on 64 bit Windows (i.e. Win7/8) but the *crack* says:

"This crack is only for 32 bit"

There is a problem here on Windows 7. Every time I start the application I am **always** asked if I want to run the software, when I have previously unmarked the case "Always ask before opening this file", of course. Sometimes it also asks if it was correctly installed.
